[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVINFO_BABYLON_STK_POPULATION]Babylon itself held around 200,000 people, and was likely the most populous city in the world at its time. The empire’s population fluctuated wildly, depending on what cities were incorporated into the polity and which ones were left out.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVINFO_BABYLON_STK_SIZE]Roughly 30,000 square miles (50,000 square km)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Friendship is a sacred pact. Let us enter into it.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Like two horses pulling a common chariot, so shall our friendship pull us forward!

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Your envoys climbed the great zuggurat with me, and gazed upon the gardens and rooftops of Babylon.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]A deal well struck gives me the greatest pleasure.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]I have issued a permit for your troops to pass through Babylon.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]I have drafted a contract of friendship. Will you make your mark upon it?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]I have broken the walls of Adab and Nippur in war. Thus I shall break your cities.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Who are you to oppose Hammurabi? You are dust, mere dirt I shake from my sandals.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Anu! Answer your servant! Why have you allowed my defeat?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]We invite you to taste the riches of Babylon. This dish is called 'the unwinding'.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Your words are perjury. Your oaths are a field in time of famine. Great Anu, forgive me for speaking with this one! (Denounces You).

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Lawless vulture, profaner of shrines, one who is hated by many gods! It is only by my great mercy that I still speak with you.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]I fill my storehouses with grain and my wells with water. The gods bless my name: Hammurabi.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Yes.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Show me your capital, and I will tell you of Babylon. It is only fair.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Come and see the glories of Babylon and see our gardens - the desert blooms with life!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]What do you want?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]To copy Hammurabi is the best course. You do this, which is good.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]I have sent to you a tablet with our names united. Will you make your mark on it?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]By pressing my seal into this tablet, I hereby agree to peace.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]We are not yet in accord. War continues.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]I send to you a request for peace. Please fill it out and send me a receipt.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]This tablet asks for safe passage for my troops. Will you put your mark on it?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Friendship is a sacred pact. I cannot agree at this time
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]I have sent your offer back. It is stamped 'rejected.'
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]Your delegation does not have the correct permits to come. The permit office is closed right now.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]The scales do not balance.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]The walls of Babylon are closed to you.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]You must do what I tell you, or I may destroy you.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_AI_RESPONSE_NEGATIVE_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]My troops are mine; they go where I order them to go.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_AI_RESPONSE_POSITIVE_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]I have put my seal upon it. My troops will withdraw from your borders.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_HAMMURABI_ANY]In the footsteps of your troops I hear the drumbeat of war. Move them back.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GREAT_PERSON_GRANT_LOTSO_SCIENCE]Grants 1000 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture (on Standard speed).
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GREAT_PERSON_INDIVIDUAL_BEATRIX_POTTER_NAME]Beatrix Potter

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GREAT_PERSON_INDIVIDUAL_BOOST_OR_GRANT_MATHEMATICS]Triggers [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka for Celestial Navigation, Mathematics, and Engineering. If they are already triggered, instead completes the tech.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GREATPERSON_CITY_STATE_ABSORB_BASE_GAME]Absorbs this city-state into your empire.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GREATPERSON_CITY_STATE_ABSORB_EXPANSIONS]Absorbs this city-state into your empire. Grants you +10 Loyalty per turn in the city.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GREATPERSON_CITY_STATE_STEAL_ENVOYS]Grants enough [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys to become Suzerain at this city-state. Then removes all other players' [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GREATPERSON_DISTRICT_SCIENCE_ADJACENCY_AS_TOURISM]Grants [ICON_Tourism] Tourism in each of this city's Districts equal to its adjacency bonus (halved for [ICON_Gold] Gold).
